ActivityMetadata.Name: LM get website graph data

ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# LogicMonitor

get website graph data

LM get website graph data

Method: Get

OperationID: getWebsiteGraphData

EndPoint:

/website/websites/{websiteId}/checkpoints/{checkpointId}/graphs/{graphName}/data
